body.name: HeyxFome X2 2024 6.5” HD+ Screen GSM Unlocked Cell Phone 4G Mobile Phones 4000mAh Android 12 Smartphone 16MP RAM 3GB Cellphone Face ID Dual SIM (Only for T-Mobile Metro Mint Tello USA Market) (Black)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 15 hrs 2 mins
features: 「4G LTE Dual Nano SIM Card」 Factory unlocked 4G cell phones are compatible with most GSM carriers like T-mobile, Metro by T-mobile, Mint, Tello and any under T-mobile network. Howerver, this mobile phone is not compatible with CDMA carriers like Verizon, Visible, Total Wireless, Xfinity Wireless, Sprint, Tracfone, Straight Talk, Spectrum, Simple, Boost or U.S.Cellular. Additionally, this smartphone is not compatible with AT&T, Cricket, H2O, Consumer Cellular or FreedomPop. Please confirm your carrier before purchasing to prevent you from being unable to use your network. No SIM card in package.

「Full-view Screen 6.5 inch HD+ Smartphone Only Weight 189g」The 6.5-inch large full screen paired with 1600 x 720 HD+ pixels gives you a delicate feeling of the unlocked smartphone’s screen. The aspect ratio of the mobile phone is 19:9, and the screen proportion is 80.33%. The unlocked cellphone is about 0.33 inches thick and weighs only 189g, providing you with an excellent grip feel.

「Android 12 Phones With Night Mode」The addition of night mode in android 12 system can more effectively protect your eyes in dim light environments, especially for the elderly and children. The updated android 12 system features with face id improved security, faster performance, better privacy controls, and a more intuitive user interface, ensuring you a seamlessly fluid experience.

「3GB + 16GB / 256GB TF Card Expansion」It should be noted that the package doesn’t include TF cards. RAM 3GB of running memory helps you smoothly switch between multiple daily apps without getting stuck. And the android phone with 16GB of built-in storage, it is enough to store daily photos. However, the system will occupy some storage space, so your unlocked cell phone will be less than 16GB. According to personal needs, you can add an external TF card up to 256GB for expansion.
「16MP+5MP Smart Phone Camera」This unlocked smartphone is equipped with a rear 16MP main camera and a 5MP front camera, making it a great expert at recording beautiful moments in life.

「4000mAh Battery Without Fast Charging」The smartphone is equipped with a 4000mAh battery that is enough to support normal use for 1 day. Attention, phone’s battery is unremovable! Please don’t open the phone cover! If the battery runs out and the cell phone can’t be turned on, please charge it for more than 30 min without any action. Unfortunately, this cellphone doesn’t support fast charging, so it will take about 2 hours to fully charge from 0%. Please arrange a charging time before going out.

「Who Is This Mobile Phone Suitable For」If you enjoy downloading many apps or you are a gamer, we are sorry this cellphone isn’t very suitable for you. This is a cheap smartphone that has given up as much profit as possible. We don’t have strong performance, please don’t compare us with high-performance phones. Therefore, if you are looking for your first phone for daily communication, browsing the internet, watching videos, and you will spend less time on phones. This will be a good choice.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Features of HeyxFome X2: Android: 12.0 Size: 166*77.5*8.5mm. Weight: 189g Battery capacity: 4000mAh (non-removable) Rear Camera: 16MP, Front Camera: 5MP Screen size: 6.5 inches (Resolution: 720*1600) 19:9 HD+ IPS Memory: 3GB RAM + 16GB ROM (TF card up to 256GB) Dual card Dual standby: Nano-SIM+Nano-SIM+TF card（Card no include） 4G carrier: Only for T-mobile, Metro by T-mobile, Mint, Tello and any under T-mobile network Practical functions: Face ID, WIFI 2.4+5G, GPS, G-sensor, Bluetooth V5, FM Radio, Email Port: 1 x Type-C & 1 x headphone jack
Smart cell phone is slim, elegant and high quality At 8.5mm thin and weighing just 189g, the affordable smartphone is easy to hold and operate with one hand.

Full screen display, take you to enjoy the infinite new world 6.5-inch Large Screen On the large 6.5-inch screen of your smartphone, you can enjoy the stunning visual experience and vivid display effects brought by each movie. 80.33% Screen-to-Body Ratio, allowing you to see more and enjoy more. 19:9 Aspect Ratio The 19:9 aspect ratio makes watching videos and playing games more comfortable, bringing you endless visual enjoyment! Full, Vivid, Smooth, Huge Display Effect The 720x1600 HD+ display takes your viewing experience to a new level in different scenarios.

16MP Camera never miss any moment The HeyxFome X2 mobile phone is equipped with a 16MP main camera, allowing you to capture wonderful moments anytime, anywhere. It can clearly freeze the beautiful scenery in front of you, and intelligently capture every unforgettable moment with your family or friends.

Unlocked 4G smartphones are compatible with T-mobile carriers Unlocked T-mobile, Metro by T-mobile, Mint, Tello and any under T-mobile network. This cell phone is NOT compatible with CDMA carriers like Verizon, Visible, Total wireless, Xfinity, Sprint, Tracfone, Straight Talk, Spectrum, Simple, Boost or U.S.Cellular. Additionally, this mobile phone is NOT compatible with AT&T, Cricket, H2O, Consumer Cellular or FreedomPop.

The large 4000mAh battery meets your daily needs ( the battery is NOT removable ) The 4000mAh battery can meet your light usage needs for a day, but if you enjoy heavy usage such as watching videos and playing games continuously, the time may be reduced. Moreover, if the outdoor temperature is low (below 10℃), the battery's usage time will also be reduced. If you have high requirements for battery life, it is recommended that you seek another phone with a larger battery life.

reviews.reviewerName: Very happy with the product no issues at all came with everything I need a case screen protector dual SIM card capable dry good Camera and battery life

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 2023 6.5” HD+Screen GSM Unlocked Cell Phone
reviews.reviewText: I love the phone the Camera is awesome face recognition capabilities dual sim capability great battery life can’t beat it for that price it’s a very very good phone or excellent starter phone or perfect for teens I’m very satisfied with the product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars :( The worst phone experience
reviews.reviewText: It worked well for a week. The following week the screen went black, and since yesterday it turns on and off by itself without stopping. I tried to return it but I'm not sure if it's safe to send it. The phone turning on and off. So it looks like I lost my money 😤🥺😥😢😓

reviews.reviewText: I've had this phone for about a month now works really well Great phone great value would recommend

reviews.reviewText: This phone is very slow. Freezes all the time. Messages are mostly hours late. All while being connected to WiFi. Very dissatisfied.
